lemma dd_commute[case_names wf trans peak]: assumes "wf r" and "trans r" and pk: "\<And>a b s t u. (s, t) \<in> L a \<Longrightarrow> (s, u) \<in> R b \<Longrightarrow> (t, u) \<in> conversion'' L R (under r a) O (R b)\<^sup>= O conversion'' L R (under r a \<union> under r b) O ((L a)\<inverse>)\<^sup>= O conversion'' L R (under r b)" shows "commute (\<Union>i. L i) (\<Union>i. R i)"
